core

Class FileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.FileLoader

  • public final class FileLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The FileLoader class is used to do the input file services. It contains only static methods which are used by the ressourceCache to obtain the desired data.
    Version:
    0.3.6
    Author:
    Jasper, Fabian

      No object should be created of this

    • Method Detail

      • loadImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadImage(java.lang.String iniFilePath,
                                     java.lang.String fileName,
                                     IMsgPump msgPump)
        This method is used to obtain the image of a map. The path can be an absolute or a relative path as an String object String
        Parameters:
        iniFilePath - the path to the ini file from the iniFilePath array in the ressourceCache. Example: "media/maps/HL001/luebeck.ini"
        fileName - the name of the file, no path just the name and suffix. Example: "luebeck.jpg"
        msgPump - the message pump
        Returns:
        the image object of the desired map picture
        Since:
        0.2.0
        See Also:
        RessourceCache, Config

      • loadImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadImage(java.lang.String filePathWithName,
                                     IMsgPump msgPump)
        Load an image as buffered image.
        Parameters:
        filePathWithName - File name
        msgPump - the message pump
        Returns:
        A buffered image

      • loadCoordinates

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.awt.Point> loadCoordinates(java.lang.String iniFilePath,
                                                             java.lang.String fileName,
                                                             IMsgPump msgPump)
        This method is used to obtain the desired coordinates of the stations in the game. The path can be an absolute or a relative path as an String object String
        Parameters:
        iniFilePath - the path to the ini file from the iniFilePath array in the ressourceCache. Example: "media/maps/HL001/luebeck.ini"
        fileName - the name of the file, no path just the name and suffix. Example: "luebeck.jpg"
        msgPump - Message pump
        Returns:
        a Map with the identifier as Key and the x,y coordinates as Point
        Since:
        0.3.6
        See Also:
        RessourceCache, Config

      • loadLinks

        public static IStationMap loadLinks(java.lang.String iniFilePath,
                    java.lang.String fileName,
                    IMsgPump msgPump)
        Return links from map files
        Parameters:
        iniFilePath - the path to the ini file from the iniFilePath array in the ressourceCache. Example: "media/maps/HL001/luebeck.ini"
        fileName - File name of the links
        msgPump - Message pump
        Returns:
        Map with all stations on the game map
